sentences.sContent: Do you want to go bowling with us Friday?
sentences.sCn: 星期五想和我们一起去打保龄球吗？

phrases.pCn: 保龄球馆；球戏场；滚球槽
n. 草地保龄球场；玩滚木球草地

words.tran: 圆顶礼帽；投球手；玩滚球的人
玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
投球；旋转；平稳快速移动

trans.tranOther: an indoor game in which you roll a large heavy ball along a wooden track in order to knock down a group of  pin s (=  wooden objects shaped like bottles  )
